extensionShortName.description: A shortened name of the extension.

extensionDescription.message: isang photon tema para sa Firefox. base sa paxmod.

desc-name.message: Mag-hover sa isang item upang makita ang deskripsyon nito

export.description: Apply options to the interface. The ID is a leftover from the website.

reload-extension-header.description: Header for the reload extension section.

reload-text.message: i-Reload ang extension para maayos ang mga problema. Hindi ito mag-clear ng mga data.
reload-text.description: Reloads the extension to potenially fix issues and does not remove data.

new-tab-background-header.description: Header for the new tab background section.

newtab-notice.message: Hindi naka-enable uc.newtab.background at hindi makita ang background.
newtab-notice.description: Notice to tell the user that they need to enable uc.newtab.background to show the background.

preview-container.message: i-Click para mabuksan sa bagong tab.

apierror-title-text.description: Heading of the API error page.

apierror-page-title.description: Title of the API error page. This is the title of the tab that opens.

apierrorShortDesc.message:
Hindi maka-load ang Zap's Cool Photon Theme extension ng mga naka-bundle na API Experiments.

Verify na:

apierror-line-1.message: Gumagamit ka ng Firefox Developer Editon o Firefox Nightly.
apierror-line-1.description: First line of the API error list which states that the user must use the Firefox Developer Editon or the Firefox Nightly browsers.

apierror-line-2.message: Ang extensions.experiments.enabled ay true sa about:config.
apierror-line-2.description: First line of the API error list which states that extensions.experiments.enabled must be enabled in about:config.

apierror-fileissue.message: Walang gumagana? Gumawa ng isyu sa GitHub.
apierror-fileissue.description: File an issue on GitHub if nothing works.
